metadata.title: CVE-2024-5702 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Memory corruption in the networking stack could have led to a potentiallyexploitable crash. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 125, Firefox ESR <115.12, and Thunderbird < 115.12.

criterions.comment: mozjs38 package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
mozjs52 package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
